thread.section_title: LightBulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LightBulbs.com | lightbulbs.com
thread.title: Mark

author: Mark
title: Mark
text:
This bulb arrived on time and with no issues. It's a unique shaped bulb which I needed to fit this lamp.
Now here's the but... There are many choices with regular bulbs in regards to the color of the light. Soft White, Warm White, Day Light, etc. I would have liked to have more choices going forward for this shape and style of bulb. Overall I am pleased with this bulb. While other rooms are bright this lamp is the warm white which is more yellow and I guess you could call southing. Perhaps if this bulb shape gets more popular it will be available in more choices.
